str2: A question, debate, controversy; a seeking, search. From zeteo; a searching, i.e. A dispute or its theme.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
Of Hebrew origin; Joannes, the name of four Israelites.
A learner, disciple, pupil. From manthano; a learner, i.e. Pupil.
(a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.
Jewish. From Iouda; Judaean, i.e. Belonging to Jehudah.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.
From katharizo; a washing off, i.e. ablution, expiation.
